title: 10.4% of DVY Holdings Seeing Recent Insider Buys - Nasdaq.com
text: A look at the weighted underlying holdings of the iShares Select Dividend ETF ( DVY  ) shows an impressive 10.4% of holdings on a weighted basis have experienced insider buying within the past six months.      Invesco Ltd (Symbol: IVZ), which makes up 0.80% of the iShares Select Dividend ETF ( DVY  ), has seen 3 directors and officers purchase shares in the past six months, according to the recent Form 4 data. The ETF holds a total of $137,075,381 worth of IVZ, making it the #63 largest holding.
